sentences.sContent: You may be accustomed to a system of national health care that is nonexistent in other places.
sentences.sContent_eng: You may be accustomed to a system of national health care that is nonexistent in other places.
sentences.sCn: 你可能习惯于其他地方所没有的某种全民医疗制度。

sentences.sContent: Although business users may not be accustomed to release management concepts, they shouldn't be allowed to make changes all the time.
sentences.sContent_eng: Although business users may not be accustomed to release management concepts, they shouldn't be allowed to make changes all the time.
sentences.sCn: 虽然业务用户可能不习惯于发布管理概念，但不允许他们在任何时间做出更改。

sentences.sContent: With RHEL5 networking, you also have the standard UNIX commands you should already be accustomed to, such as route, the netstat commands, and other utilities like ping and traceroute.
sentences.sContent_eng: With RHEL5 networking, you also have the standard UNIX commands you should already be accustomed to, such as route, the netstat commands, and other utilities like ping and traceroute.
sentences.sCn: 对于 RHEL5 网络，您还可以使用应该已经习惯了的标准 UNIX 命令，例如 route、netstat 命令，以及诸如 ping 和 traceroute 等其他实用工具。
